Articles.Content:
Hi there,

is there way to let the Kerbals have there spawnpoint not inside the rocket but maybe something like in front of the Astronauts Complex?

I just discovered that FASA Launchtowers and was thinking, if there is an interesting way to use that right from the start.

Greetings!

Horman

Edited September 17, 2014 by Horman
Not that i know of... Only way would be to launch the Kerbals in a pod before the real launch.

"Launch" your empty rocket to launchpad.

Now launch your crew to runway, in their astronaut bus.

Drive over tot the launchpad, hold your press conference and then board your rocket.

Marvin, that idea sounds perfect under this cirumstances...

Maybe we should suggest something like this to the mod developers?!
